text: Aminah Brenda Lynn Robinson (February 18, 1940 â€“ May 22, 2015) was an American artist.http://fisher.osu.edu/art/robinson/robinson.htm Robinson received her formal art training at the Columbus Art School (now the Columbus College of Art and Design). She was known for creating sculptures in Columbus neighborhoods. Robinson died on May 22, 2015 from heart failure, aged 75.http://www.toledonewsnow.com/story/29150112/ohio-artist-known-for-mixed- media-storytelling-work-dies ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:American artists Category:People from Columbus, Ohio
